name: Mothman Murder Mystery
description:
Mothman enjoys a nice meal, but is interrupted by two friends. Who killed Dustin? It's a mystery to us all.

Controls: Left click/Spacebar/Enter/Z on the dialogue box to skip the text. Click and drag the scrollbar or use the mouse wheel to scroll down. If you're playing a downloaded version, use Alt+F4 to close the game.

Made in 3 total hours for Trijam #173.

m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen.
